newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Grain, soy basis mostly steady.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Grain, soy basis mostly steady.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf wheat basis bids remained steady on Wednesday as the market continued to wait for harvesting to gather pace after recent rain delays.
"We're still waiting to dry out," one dealer said, noting business should pick up once more wheat is harvested and the quality of this year's crop becomes clearer.
Rains this week delayed soft red winter wheat harvesting in central Mississippi and hard red winter wheat harvesting in Texas.
Corn and soybean basis bids were also mostly steady.
SOYBEANS (No. 2 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu)
Note: N=CBOT July, Q=CBOT August, nc=no comparison
SRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
